measure: recommendation to follow hygiene rules (washing of hands, sneezing into elbow, avoid crowded places)
Event with 1000 or more persons are prohibited, including carneval
Suspected cases with symptoms are asked to self-isolate until 24 hours after stop of symptoms. Confirmed cases are asked to self-isolate until 48 hours after stop of symptoms, but at least 10 days
Contact tracing implemented for first COVID case
Restriction of visiting hours to nursing homes
Ban of events with 100 or more persons
Restriction of max. 50 persons in Restaurants, Bars and Clubs
Recommendation for children to stay at home if they have been staying in a region that has been affected by Covid-19 and/or that have symptoms to stay away from school.
Visits in retirement homes are generally forbidden.
Visits in institutions for disabled persons and addicts are forbidden.
establishment of a drive-in corona test center at Bern Expo. Prior registration mandatory
Establishment of online survey for collection of self-reported symptoms and test results by the general population
